SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.PRODUCT_NM DESC) AS ROWNUM, a.PRODUCT_CODE, a.PRODUCT_NM, (SELECT FILE_ID FROM t_group_file WHERE GFILE_ID = PHOTO_GFILE_ID AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY RGST_DT ASC LIMIT 1) AS PHOTO_GFILE_ID, cc.CODE_ID AS MAT_TYPE, cc.CODE_NM AS MAT_TYPE_NM, bb.CODE_NM AS MASTER_APPLY_NM, '보통' AS SELF_EVL_GRAD_NM FROM T1_PRODUCT a
LEFT OUTER JOIN t1_product_packaging aa ON a.PRODUCT_CODE = aa.PRODUCT_CODE AND aa.USE_YN = 'Y' AND aa.PACKAGING_ORDER = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN t1_environment_code cc ON cc.GROUP_ID = 'GROUP_ID' AND cc.CODE_ID = aa.GROUP_ID AND cc.USE_YN = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_code bb ON bb.GROUP_ID = 'ENVIRONMENT_PROCEED_STAT_CODE' AND a.MASTER_APPLY_CODE = bb.CODE_ID AND bb.USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY a.PRODUCT_CODE, ROWNUM
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T1_PRODUCT WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T1_PRODUCT WHERE upper(PRODUCT_CODE) = upper(#{productCode}) AND USE_YN = 'Y'

, a.MASTER_MAPPING_CODE , b.MAPPING_PRODUCT_CODE , b.PRODUCT_NM MAPPING_PRODUCT_NM
, a.RGST_ID , a.RGST_DT , a.MODI_ID , a.MODI_DT FROM T1_PRODUCT a LEFT OUTER JOIN T1_PRODUCT b ON upper(a.PRODUCT_CODE) = upper(b.MAPPING_PRODUCT_CODE) AND b.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE upper(a.PRODUCT_CODE) = upper(#{productCode}) AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'

mapper.select: SELECT a.CODE_ID GROUP_ID , a.CODE_NM GROUP_NM , b.CODE_ID CODE_ID , b.CODE_NM CODE_NM , IF(a.CODE_NM = b.CODE_NM, a.CODE_NM, CONCAT('(',a.CODE_NM,'-', b.CODE_NM,')')) AS groupCodeNm FROM t_environ_price a, t_environ_price b WHERE a.code_id = b.group_id ORDER BY a.ORD_SEQ, b.ORD_SEQ

SELECT aa.ENV_CODE_ID , aa.ENV_CODE_NM , aa.CODE_ID , aa.CODE_NM FROM ( SELECT a.CODE_ID ENV_CODE_ID , a.CODE_NM ENV_CODE_NM , b.CODE_ID , b.CODE_NM , b.ORD_SEQ FROM t1_environment_code a , t_code b WHERE a.GROUP_ID = #{inGroupId} AND b.GROUP_ID = 'PROD_PART_TYPE' AND b.CODE_ID = right(a.CODE_ID,1) UNION SELECT '' ENV_CODE_ID , '' ENV_CODE_NM , b.CODE_ID , b.CODE_NM , b.ORD_SEQ FROM t_code b WHERE b.GROUP_ID = 'PROD_PART_TYPE' AND b.CODE_ID = 'S' ) aa ORDER BY aa.ORD_SEQ

SELECT a.PACKAGING_DETAIL_ID , a.PACKAGING_ID , a.PART_CODE , b.CODE_NM PART_NM , b.ORD_SEQ FROM t1_product_packaging_detail a
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_code b ON b.GROUP_ID = 'PROD_PART_TYPE' AND a.PART_CODE = b.CODE_ID AND b.USE_YN = 'Y'
WHERE a.PACKAGING_ID = #{packagingId} AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY b.ORD_SEQ, a.PACKAGING_DETAIL_ID

SELECT a.PACKAGING_DETAIL_ID , a.PACKAGING_ID , a.PART_CODE , b.CODE_NM PART_NM , b.ORD_SEQ , a.MAT_INFO , a.WEIGHT , a.STANDARD , a.COLOR , a.SUMMARY , a.MAT_FILE_ID , e.FILE_NM AS MAT_FILE_NM , e.FILE_URL AS MAT_FILE_URL , a.SUPPLIER_CODE , c.SUPPLIER_NM , a.MANAGER_ID , d.MANAGER_NM , d.MANAGER_MAIL FROM t1_product_packaging_detail a
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_code b ON b.GROUP_ID = 'PROD_PART_TYPE' AND a.PART_CODE = b.CODE_ID AND b.USE_YN = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_supplier c ON a.SUPPLIER_CODE = c.SUPPLIER_CODE AND c.USE_YN = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_supplier_manager d ON a.SUPPLIER_CODE = d.SUPPLIER_CODE AND a.MANAGER_ID = d.MANAGER_ID AND d.USE_YN = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_file e ON a.MAT_FILE_ID = e.FILE_ID AND e.USE_YN = 'Y' AND e.DEL_YN = 'N'
WHERE a.PACKAGING_DETAIL_ID = #{packagingDetailId} AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE t1_product_packaging_detail SET PACKAGING_ID = #{packagingId} , PART_CODE = #{partCode} , MAT_INFO = #{matInfo} , WEIGHT = #{weight} , STANDARD = #{standard} , COLOR = #{color} , SUMMARY = #{summary} , MAT_FILE_ID = #{matFileId} , SUPPLIER_CODE = #{supplierCode} , MANAGER_ID = #{managerId} , MODI_ID = #{modiId} , MODI_DT = now() WHERE PACKAGING_DETAIL_ID = #{packagingDetailId}
mapper.select:
SELECT right(a.CODE_ID,1) AS PART_CODE , aa.CODE_NM PART_NM , right(b.CODE_ID,1) AS GRADE_CODE , bb.CODE_NM GRADE_NM , c.GROUP_ID , c.CODE_ID , c.CODE_NM , cc.CODE_ID AS CHECKED , c.RPT_MAT_STRUCT , c.RPT_DEV_ANAL , c.RPT_VISUAL_JUDG , c.RPT_TEST , c.RPT_PERMISSION , c.RPT_ETC FROM t1_environment_code a LEFT OUTER JOIN t_code aa ON aa.GROUP_ID = 'PROD_PART_TYPE' AND aa.CODE_ID = right(a.CODE_ID,1) AND aa.USE_YN = 'Y'
, t1_environment_code b LEFT OUTER JOIN t_code bb ON bb.GROUP_ID = 'PROD_GRADE_TYPE' AND bb.CODE_ID = right(b.CODE_ID,1) AND bb.USE_YN = 'Y'
, t1_environment_code c LEFT OUTER JOIN t1_product_packaging_self cc ON cc.PACKAGING_ID = #{packagingId} AND c.GROUP_ID = cc.GROUP_ID AND c.CODE_ID = cc.CODE_ID AND cc.USE_YN = 'Y'
, t1_product_packaging d WHERE d.PACKAGING_ID = #{packagingId} AND a.GROUP_ID = d.GROUP_ID AND b.GROUP_ID = a.CODE_ID AND c.GROUP_ID = b.CODE_ID ORDER BY aa.ORD_SEQ, bb.ORD_SEQ, c.ORD_SEQ

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(PACKAGING_ORDER) + 1 , 1) AS PACKAGING_ORDER , CONCAT(IFNULL(MAX(PACKAGING_ORDER) + 1 , 1),'차포장') AS PACKAGING_ORDER_NM FROM t1_product_packaging WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND PACKAGING_ORDER < 9 UNION SELECT IFNULL(MAX(PACKAGING_ORDER) + 1 , 11) AS PACKAGING_ORDER , '부속포장' AS PACKAGING_ORDER_NM FROM t1_product_packaging WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND PACKAGING_ORDER > 10

SELECT z.PART_CODE , z.PART_NM , z.MAT_REPORT_CODE , z.MAT_REPORT_NM
, z1.FILE_ID , z2.FILE_NM AS MAT_FILE_NM , z2.FILE_URL AS MAT_FILE_URL , z.A_ORD_SEQ , z.C_ORD_SEQ FROM ( SELECT right(a.CODE_ID,1) AS PART_CODE , aa.CODE_NM PART_NM , c.CODE_ID MAT_REPORT_CODE , c.CODE_NM MAT_REPORT_NM , a.ORD_SEQ A_ORD_SEQ , c.ORD_SEQ C_ORD_SEQ FROM t1_environment_code a
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_code aa ON aa.GROUP_ID = 'PROD_PART_TYPE' AND aa.CODE_ID = right(a.CODE_ID,1) AND aa.USE_YN = 'Y'
, t1_product_packaging b , t_code c
WHERE b.USE_YN = 'Y' AND b.PACKAGING_ID = #{packagingId} AND a.GROUP_ID = b.GROUP_ID AND c.GROUP_ID = 'MAT_REPORT_CODE' AND c.USE_YN = 'Y'
) z LEFT OUTER JOIN t1_product_packaging_self_file z1 ON z1.PACKAGING_ID = #{packagingId} AND z1.PART_CODE = z.PART_CODE AND z.MAT_REPORT_CODE = z1.MAT_REPORT_CODE AND z1.USE_YN = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_file z2 ON z1.FILE_ID = z2.FILE_ID AND z2.USE_YN = 'Y' AND z2.DEL_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY z.A_ORD_SEQ, z.C_ORD_SEQ

SELECT a.PACKAGING_DETAIL_ID , a.PACKING_ID , a.PART_CODE , a.MAT_INFO , a.WEIGHT , a.STANDARD , a.COLOR , a.SUMMARY , a.MAT_FILE_ID , a.SUPPLIER_CODE , a.MANAGER_ID , a.USE_YN , a.RGST_ID , a.RGST_DT , a.MODI_ID , a.MODI_DT FROM t_product_packaging a WHERE a.PACKAGING_ID = #{packaging} AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'
